# m-checkbox



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property           | Attribute       | Description                                          | Type                                                                             | Default     |
| ------------------ | --------------- | ---------------------------------------------------- | -------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ----------- |
| `checked`          | `checked`       | Checkbox is checked                                  | `boolean`                                                                        | `false`     |
| `disabled`         | `disabled`      | Disabled state                                       | `boolean`                                                                        | `false`     |
| `indeterminate`    | `indeterminate` | If checkbox is indeterminated                        | `boolean \| undefined`                                                           | `undefined` |
| `label`            | --              | The text to display in the switch.                   | `null`                                                                           | `null`      |
| `mId` _(required)_ | `m-id`          | Label identifier                                     | `string`                                                                         | `undefined` |
| `state`            | `state`         | State of checkbox: Succeess, Error, Warning, Loading | `"error" \| "indeterminate" \| "loading" \| "success" \| "warning" \| undefined` | `undefined` |
